ComicInfo.Series: Van Helsing vs The Mummy of Amun-Ra
ComicInfo.Summary:
Liesel Van Helsing on the run! After being framed for attempted murder, Van Helsing finds herself on the wrong side of the law. Now, as the Mummy of Amun-Ra unites the crime families of New York, Van Helsing has to make a choice... protect the city or protect herself?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sheldon Goh & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Andrea Meloni & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 5 | | D | Cover D | Jason Metcalf & Wes Hartman | 6 | | E | Calgary Comic Expo Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Michael Dooney (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 2 | | F | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: How I Learned To Travel Through Time Like A Ghost
